Features

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.

Readable

Formatting is retained if possible so your generated code is as similar as possible.

class User extends Model {
  constructor() {
    super();
    this.sayHello();
  }

  sayHello() {
    alert("Hello World!");
  }
}
var User = function User() {
  Model.call(this);
  this.sayHello();
};

_extends(User, Model);

User.prototype.sayHello = function () {
  alert("Hello World!");
};

Extensible

With a large range of plugins and browser support.

Lossless

Source map support so you can debug your compiled code with ease.

Compact

Maps directly to the equivalent ES5 with no runtime.*

class User extends Model {
  constructor() {
    super();
    this.sayHello();
  }

  sayHello() {
    alert("Hello World!");
  }
}

var User = function User() {
  Model.call(this);
  this.sayHello();
};

_extends(User, Model);

User.prototype.sayHello = function () {
  alert("Hello World!");
};
